text:
Hi <@U0397BZRK6G>
I have completed the Membership functionality. When a user fills out a new form and submits it, they receive an email through HubSpot to create their password. Afterward, they can log in, use the forgot password feature, etc.

Now, I have a new requirement from the client. If the user is already in the contact list, their email for resetting the password should be sent from HubSpot. How can this be achieved?

Can you please assist me with this?

Thank you so much :pray::pray::pray:
